com.reportmill.graphics

Class RMImageEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • SnapObject
      • com.reportmill.graphics.RMEffect
        • com.reportmill.graphics.RMImageEffect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RMBlurEffect, RMEmbossEffect, RMReflectionEffect, RMShadowEffect

    public abstract class RMImageEffect
extends RMEffect
    A effect based on image filtering.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RMImageEffect.BoxKernel
      A kernel class for box filters (really?).
      static class  RMImageEffect.ConeKernel
      A kernel class for cone effects.
      static class  RMImageEffect.GaussianKernel
      Extends Kernel with constructor which takes Kernel size and automatically generates a gaussian matrix.
